price: Mu’uminoonni obboleeyyani; gidduu obboleeyyan keessanii tolchaa. Rabbiin sodaadhaa Akka mararfatamtanuuf jecha.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-mu'minūna ikh'watun fa-aṣliḥū bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
